## CanvasCartesianUpdateHooks class

Canvas update hook, called before and after a plot is drawn.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CanvasCartesianUpdateHooks implements ICategoryUpdateHooks<ICanvasRenderer, ICartesian2dUpdateArg<Float64Array>> 
```
